== Introduction ==
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="text-align: justify; width:55%; " style="border:none;" 5%> <nowiki>[[File:rationalplan.png]]</nowiki>
| <style="border:none">'''RationalPlan''' is a powerful  cross-platform project management software and a great alternative to Microsoft Project with some extra-features like multiproject management.
|}

RationalPlan is designed to assist project managers in developing plans, allocating resources, tracking progress, managing budgets and analyzing workload.

If you are working in the area of construction, engineering, services&consulting, business, software development or even working on a simple student project then you can use RationalPlan. It will help you to complete your project as scheduled, on time and within budget.

If you have projects that are interrelated that is certain tasks from one project depend on other tasks from the other projects then you should opt in for a <nowiki>[[http://www.rationalplan.com/multi-project-management-software.php|Multi Project]]</nowiki> version. Even more... you should choose a Multi Project version if you have resources that are working in multiple projects. Otherwise the <nowiki>[[http://www.rationalplan.com/single-project-management-software.php|Single Project]]</nowiki> version is enough.

The free <nowiki>[[http://www.rationalplan.com/viewer-project-management-software.php|Project Viewer]]</nowiki> will allow all project stakeholders to view all project details in a dynamic.

== Installing current release from official website ==

''RationalPlan is can be downloaded from the official website <nowiki>[[http://www.rationalplan.com/download.php|download page]]</nowiki>.''

== Other info ==

This section deals with other aspects of RationalPlan.

=== Feedback ===

RationalPlan was developed with an ergonomic design in mind and highly user centered. Feedback was and still is the best source of ideas for development so it is highly welcomed.

If you would like to report a bug in RationalPlan or request a feature just <nowiki>[[http://www.rationalplan.com/support.php|contact support team]]</nowiki>.
